title: Ramonote | Unsent Messages
description: A safe space for expressing feelings to those you've lost touch with

home.subheading: A safe space to share the messages you never sent to those you've lost or drifted apart from.

timedMessages.title: Timed Messages
timedMessages.description: Create messages that will be revealed at a specific date in the future. Perfect for anniversaries, birthdays, or when you're ready for your words to be heard.

sharedMemories.title: Shared Memories
sharedMemories.description: Post short stories or moments you cherish with someone special. Create a digital diary of your most meaningful connections.

footer.aboutText: A safe space for expressing feelings to those you've lost touch with. Share your unsent messages anonymously and connect with others who understand.
